channel.title: Just Wondering .
channel.description: Is it possible to fix a few of the spell glitches? these are . . . -Some spells only work on NPCS -Some spells only work on players -When you're not able to cast the spell, it hits a 0 and you make the casting motion -Non damaging spells do the same as above -REAL WORKING hold effect?
